sn51.25:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these four bases of psychic power.
sn51.25:1.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm …
sn51.25:1.7: These are the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.25:1.8: Because of developing and cultivating these four bases of psychic power, one of two results can be expected:
sn51.25:1.9: enlightenment in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.”
